title: Uncut Waistcoat Front, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
dimensions: H x W x D: 160 x 72 cm (5 ft. 3 in. x 28 3/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Two incomplete panels for waistcoat, white satin embroidered waistcoat in polychrome silks; pattern of boar hunt, foliage, floral borders.
